Package com.kneelawk.codextra.api.attach.codec

Class OpsReplacingRecordBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.codextra.api.attach.codec.OpsReplacingRecordBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type this record builder builds.
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.mojang.serialization.RecordBuilder<T>
public class OpsReplacingRecordBuilder<T> extends Object implements com.mojang.serialization.RecordBuilder<T>
RecordBuilder that delegates to another record builder but that replaces the ops.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Method Details

    • wrap

      public static <T> com.mojang.serialization.RecordBuilder<T> wrap(com.mojang.serialization.RecordBuilder<T> delegate, com.mojang.serialization.DynamicOps<T> newOps)
      Wraps the given builder, so that it uses the given ops.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type this record builder builds.
      Parameters:
      delegate - the registry builder to wrap.
      newOps - the ops to use instead of the delegates ops.
      Returns:
      the wrapper record builder, with the given ops.

    • unwrap

      public static <T> com.mojang.serialization.RecordBuilder<T> unwrap(com.mojang.serialization.RecordBuilder<T> wrapped, com.mojang.serialization.RecordBuilder<T> original, com.mojang.serialization.DynamicOps<T> originalOps)
      Unwraps the given builder if it is an ops-replacing builder.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type this record builder builds.
      Parameters:
      wrapped - the builder returned by MapEncoder.encode(Object, DynamicOps, RecordBuilder).
      original - the original builder before it got wrapped.
      originalOps - the original ops before it was changed.
      Returns:
      the unwrapped builder.
